title: Game Character Knight Sound Effects and Voice Pack
description: Command in-game character audio excellence with ESM's newest voice over sound library “Game Character Knight”.
longDescription:
Soundcloud Demo

This fantasy character voice sound pack is jam packed with over 480+ custom lines, battle cries, fight vocals, vocalizations and everything you need to create immersive character dialogue, rich cinematic game scenes and believable interactive experiences.

Game Character showcases dynamic and scripted fantasy male voice samples, inspired by hit games like World of Warcraft. Created to cater to top tier game studios and designers, Game Character Knight, ensures that every game will have a compelling fantasy hero! The Game Character Knight voice sample pack has a recognizable sound that your audience will surely love. Now you can protect your king and your kings realms alike and serve justice to the evil abominations that lay waste to his lands.. “vocally speaking”, that is.

Don’t forget! Game Character is easy to use: Presented in multiple Formats: 44.1k 16Bit. You instantly get to have access to whichever format best suits your project. Game Character Knight – a heroic, justice serving humanoid game voice over sound bank of immersive dialogue and game audio.
technicalDetails:
• 652.3 MB of vocal samples
  • Includes Format:.Wav 44.1k 16Bit
  • Game Character Voice Over Sound Effects Library
  • Perfect for fantasy games, film and trailers
  • 22 battle cries and sayings
  • 4 breathing paces – quick, slow, quiet, fast
  • 12 coughing files like muffled, wheezy, hacking, deep
  • 12 blubbering cries, long, short, wailing, sniffling and explosive
  • 160 interactive scripted dialogue lines like evil does not stand a chance and for the king
  • 50 fighting vocals – groans, grunt, swing, pain, throw, roar and more
  • 20 game character jumps -big, double jump, short, windup
  • 24 laughing voice sounds – happy, explosive, long evil, boisterous, sensible
  • 34 pain vocals – wounded, painful, ouch, drying, last breath
  • 145 stock dialogue lines like – moving into position, our allies base is under attack, you win

Number of Audio Waves:483

Number of Audio Cues:483

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 30+m

Supported Development Platforms:Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus, SteamVR / HTC Vive, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5,

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus, SteamVR / HTC Vive, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5,

Documentation: Content List
